Text: Re internshipI talked to the Human Resource rep They told me if the head of gas control can find something for you to do we could bring you on The head of gas control Patty Sullivan has been out all week so hopefully I should know something next week
Christmas Partywas told to RSVP to you for the Christmas Party My wife Ann South and Myself Steve South Will attend I am ENA gas trading
Christmas Partywas told to RSVP for the Christmas party I Steve South will be there with my wife Ann South I work for ENA in gas trading
Re FW Agenda BC Gas Customer Meeting November you for the invite I will be attending
Re FW Agenda BC Gas Customer Meeting November will attend Thank you very much
packers beat the steelers steelers we are now also please call me soon about playoffs as I may be out of town monday the th but will not plan this trip if we play that night Home work
packers beat chargersbeat Chargers to

packer yearcase some of my emails are floating through cyber space Ill recap packers cardinals packers vikings bucs packers packers patriots packers bears packers raiders let me know if you receive this
RE packers beat raidersPackers improve their record to with a win over the Raiders
RE packers beat Bearsresult of the Cy Fair footballs oldest rivalry the Packers top the Bears to

opal gas day Forwarded by Steven P SouthHOUECT on PM on PM To cc Subject opal gas day Of the we sold was not able to get scheduled by the timely nom With problems at Kemmerer this volume is vulnerable to cuts Any more thought on how this problem can be resolved
Re internshipjust looked at your email Ill check into interns
packers beat vikingsPackers beat the Vikings to on Oct
Re arkansas tripwill be in Wisconsin the week before and will leave early am on Sat We should get to ark sat evening Where are we this year
set up Dexter Steis at NGI with a guest password ASAP This is a publication that is extremely important to Enron as this sets the California Index Dexters email address is

Re Please review new locations changesfor the work on the new locations the changes are as follow below From Melba Lozano AM To Steven P CT cc Chris CT Robert B CT Kevin NRON Subject Please review new locations Steve Please review the attached language for the new locations Thanks Melba LocationMiscNorthwest pipeline gas North of Green River Abbreviation as it appears on the web NW No GR Sort Code Description as it appears on the webThe transaction is for receipt point gas Nort h of Green River south of Kemmer at sellers choice of point on Northwest Pipeline REQD BYSteve South LocationMisc Northwest pipeline gas South of Green River Abbreviation as it appears on the web NW So GR Sort Code Description as it appears on the webThe transaction is for receipt point gas Sout h of Green River at sellers choice of point on Northwest Pipeline REQD BYSteve South
Re Price Missingagree with bc gas on deal I have changed it in sitara

FW Wild Goose Open SeasonForwarded by Steven P SouthHOUECT on PM Ledene Ben on AM To Steve South Email cc Subject FW Wild Goose Open Season Steve it was good seeing you again in Reno Here is a copy of the package that was sent out to Frank Ermis on January If you have any questions please give me a call Thanks Ben Original Message From Ledene Ben Sent Friday January PM To Barry Brunelle Email Brad Barnds Email Brent Rook Email Craig Pentelichuk Email Dave Clare Email Dave Kohler Email David Ellis Email Denette Johnson Email Don Clements Email Frank Ermis Email Gary Venz Email Joseph Sestak Email Kevin E Coyle Email Kevin Legg Email LoreLei Reid Email Monica Padilla Email Nathan Reinhardt Email Paul Gendron Email Ray McCluer Email Scott W Walton Email Stephen J Swain Email Susan Jones Email Tom Toerner Email Weaman Ng Email Cc Chris Price Email Hogue Bill Amirault Paul Subject Wild Goose Open Season Long Term Firm Base Load Storage BLS Service Open Season For service commencing April Customer offers required by pm MST Friday January Customer offers must be reasonably open for acceptance by Wild Goose Storage Inc until pm MST Thursday February subject only to significant changes in market conditions and final approval of customers management Preference for offer acceptance will be toward longerterm contracts years and offers which exceed of our rack rate The offer sheets are provided in Microsoft Excel and are set up to calculate the percentage of rack rate for your convenience It is the intent of Wild Goose Storage Inc to negotiate and conclude contracts with the participants providing acceptable offers in this open season as close as possible to February Wild Goose Storage Inc reserves the right to not necessarily accept the highest priced offer nor to award all or any of the storage capacity available A reasonable summary of the main terms and features of BLS service is attached for your convenience Attached File BLS Summary but should not be used as the sole terms by which service is to be provided All service is subject to the Tariff Schedules for Natural Gas Storage Service of Wild Goose Storage Inc as approved by the Public Utilities Commission of the State of California For more information about Wild Goose Storage Inc or to download a copy of the entire tariff please refer to our web site at wwwwildgoosestoragecom Customer offers must include the following A Completed Offer Forms Attached File Offer Sheets for each year of service including the amount of Inventory Capacity Required for each April to March period the amount of Maximum Daily Injection Quantity Required by month the amount of Maximum Daily Withdrawal Quantity Required by month the Total Storage Demand Charge for each April to March period the Injection Commodity Rate for each April to March period the Withdrawal Commodity Rate for each April to March period a signature from an authorized employee of the company verifying the offer for each April to March period In the Offer Sheets file attachment you will find the following tabs at the bottom offer sheet for the first year of service April to March see Service Restriction note below offer sheet for to be used for years and beyond please print out a copy for each April to March period a manual offer sheet which can be printed out and filled in by hand an example offer B An executed Storage Services Agreement Attached File Storage Services Agreement unless your company already has one on file with Wild Goose Storage Inc Service Restriction Do to the volume of business already in place for the first year of service there is a limited amount of Maximum Daily Injection Quantity available Therefor for all offers will be limited to Dthday of Maximum Daily Injection Quantity during the period of April through March All other terms of service are reasonably open for the first year and beyond Rack Rates Our rates are market based meaning they are fully negotiable but our rack rates are as follows Monthly Storage Demand Charges InventoryDth Injection Dthday Withdrawal Dthday Variable Charges Injection Commodity Rate Dth Withdrawal Commodity Rate Dth Fuel Charges In addition to the Demand and Variable charges described above fuel costs are also charged based on actual consumption by customer and the value of the gas on a daily basis Fuel consumption is expected to be between to For details please refer to the Wild Goose tariff If you have any questions about this matter or need hard copies please contact either Ben Ledene at or Chris Price at Offer Sheetsxls Wild Goose Open Seasondoc BLS Summarydoc Storage Services Agreementdoc Offer Sheetsxls Wild Goose Open Seasondoc BLS Summarydoc Storage Services Agreementdoc

RE barrett dec invoicehave changed the price in sitara Forwarded by Steven P SouthHOUECT on PM Elizabeth L Hernandez PM To Isabel Y CT cc Steven P CT Subject RE barrett dec invoice If Steve agreed to the price he needs to go in and change Sitara Steve please update Sitara Isabel Y Resendez PM To Elizabeth L CT cc Subject RE barrett dec invoice Elizabeth Have you heard from Steve Barrett just send me this note and it says that Steve has confirm the price for Deal Thank you isabel Forwarded by Isabel Y ResendezHOUECT on PM Hilary Searles on PM To cc Subject RE barrett dec invoice Isabel I just sent the support for the volume cuts I also spoke with my trader and she called Steve South at your company Steve confirmed that the price for the th st was Malin gas daily Let me know if there is anything else you need Thanks Hilary Original Message From SMTP Sent Thursday January AM To Cc Subject REbarrett dec invoice Hilary I have not received the pipe support that you said you were going to send Please send the support so that I can get the volumes corrected Also I have not heard from the trader regarding the NGI malin price Have you asked your trader Please we need to get this down to a reasonable dollar amount According to our records Barrett still owes Enron mil dollars I appreciate you sending that pipe support as soon as posible so that I can get the corrections rolling thanks isabel
Re barrettdeal was in fact gas daily
all star selectionsplan on calling my all star selections tonight but Im not sure what to tell them as far as practices are concerned also do the Packers still get plus alternate

RE barrett dec invoicehave changed the price in sitara Forwarded by Steven P SouthHOUECT on PM Elizabeth L Hernandez PM To Isabel Y CT cc Steven P CT Subject RE barrett dec invoice If Steve agreed to the price he needs to go in and change Sitara Steve please update Sitara Isabel Y Resendez PM To Elizabeth L CT cc Subject RE barrett dec invoice Elizabeth Have you heard from Steve Barrett just send me this note and it says that Steve has confirm the price for Deal Thank you isabel Forwarded by Isabel Y ResendezHOUECT on PM Hilary Searles on PM To cc Subject RE barrett dec invoice Isabel I just sent the support for the volume cuts I also spoke with my trader and she called Steve South at your company Steve confirmed that the price for the th st was Malin gas daily Let me know if there is anything else you need Thanks Hilary Original Message From SMTP Sent Thursday January AM To Cc Subject REbarrett dec invoice Hilary I have not received the pipe support that you said you were going to send Please send the support so that I can get the volumes corrected Also I have not heard from the trader regarding the NGI malin price Have you asked your trader Please we need to get this down to a reasonable dollar amount According to our records Barrett still owes Enron mil dollars I appreciate you sending that pipe support as soon as posible so that I can get the corrections rolling thanks isabel
Re barrettdeal was in fact gas daily

RE barrett dec invoicehave changed the price in sitara Forwarded by Steven P SouthHOUECT on PM Elizabeth L Hernandez PM To Isabel Y CT cc Steven P CT Subject RE barrett dec invoice If Steve agreed to the price he needs to go in and change Sitara Steve please update Sitara Isabel Y Resendez PM To Elizabeth L CT cc Subject RE barrett dec invoice Elizabeth Have you heard from Steve Barrett just send me this note and it says that Steve has confirm the price for Deal Thank you isabel Forwarded by Isabel Y ResendezHOUECT on PM Hilary Searles on PM To cc Subject RE barrett dec invoice Isabel I just sent the support for the volume cuts I also spoke with my trader and she called Steve South at your company Steve confirmed that the price for the th st was Malin gas daily Let me know if there is anything else you need Thanks Hilary Original Message From SMTP Sent Thursday January AM To Cc Subject REbarrett dec invoice Hilary I have not received the pipe support that you said you were going to send Please send the support so that I can get the volumes corrected Also I have not heard from the trader regarding the NGI malin price Have you asked your trader Please we need to get this down to a reasonable dollar amount According to our records Barrett still owes Enron mil dollars I appreciate you sending that pipe support as soon as posible so that I can get the corrections rolling thanks isabel
